      • containRepeatedly

      • isSameDay

        public static boolean isSameDay(java.util.Date beginTime,

        Whether the 2 time are in same day.

      • formatNumericString

        public static java.lang.String formatNumericString(java.lang.String input,
                                   java.lang.String delimeter)
        If a selected number is started with '0', remove it. For example if selected number is '01,20,10,09', will be formatted to '1,20,10,9'.

      • string2IntArray

        public static int[] string2IntArray(java.lang.String numberPart,
                    java.lang.String numberDelemeter,
                    boolean sortArray)
        Convert a number string into number array. for example, convert a string '09,02,23,19' into [2,9,19,23] if needs to sorting, otherwise [9,2,23,19]

      • mathDivide

        public static java.math.BigDecimal mathDivide(java.math.BigDecimal denominator,

      • splitToLong

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.Long> splitToLong(java.lang.String input,
                                         java.lang.String delimiter)
        Translate a string into long list.
        参数:
        input - A string composed of digital and delimiter, for example '2,12,23'.
        delimiter - The delimiter which used to separate digits.

      • join

        public static java.lang.String join(int[] numbers,
                    int indexOfBegin,
                    int count,
                    java.lang.String joinChar)
        Join the numbers by supplied joining char.
        参数:
        numbers - The source numbers.
        indexOfBegin - The index on begin element, it starts with 0.
        count - How many elements will be joined.
        joinChar - The joining char.
        返回:
        a string generated from supplied numbers, such as '2,4,3'

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
